headline.main: More Consensus on Coffee’s Effect on Health Than You Might Think

docs.abstract: The Upshot; number of meta-analyses of research done on health effects of coffee have found that beverage is mostly beneficial to health, with very few to no detrimental effects.
docs.lead_paragraph: A review of studies shows that coffee’s reputation as being unhealthy is undeserved, with the potential health benefits surprisingly large.
docs.snippet: A review of studies shows that coffee’s reputation as being unhealthy is undeserved, with the potential health benefits surprisingly large.

headline.print_headline: Recalls This Week: Cribs, Axes, Power Furniture
headline.main: Recalls This Week: Cribs, Axes, Power Furniture

docs.lead_paragraph: Cribs and furniture for babies are being recalled this week because they contain excessive levels of lead. Other recalled consumer products include axes with faulty handles and power reclining furniture that can overheat.
docs.snippet: Cribs and furniture for babies are being recalled this week because they contain excessive levels of lead. Other recalled consumer products include axes with faulty handles and power reclining furniture that can overheat.
